name: MondayClub
description: Monday Club provides ecosystem to make working life fun again by bridging between traditional working life and life on the blockchain - through Avatar NFTs, MetaOffice, Crypto payrolls & simplified DeFi investments. Working people can earn more by accepting salaries and benefits in cryptocurrencies; Gain privileged access to communities, physical world benefits or exclusive social events with our NFTs; and Meet new opportunities / employers in Monday Club metaverse. LANDS and ASSETS in the Monday Club metaverse can be acquired using $MONDAY.
